name: textView(_:willCheckTextIn:options:types:)
desc: Invoked to allow the delegate to modify the text checking process before it occurs.
declaration:
optional func textView(_ view: NSTextView, 
       willCheckTextIn range: NSRange, 
               options: [NSSpellChecker.OptionKey : Any] = [:], 
                 types checkingTypes: UnsafeMutablePointer<NSTextCheckingTypes>) -> [NSSpellChecker.OptionKey : Any]
